description: Custom designed for your precious Apple Mini iPad 7.9 inch Tablet, this MoKo case features a combination of functionality and style.Premium quality PU leather boosts a classy look;No-scratch microfiber interior adds comfort and an additional layer of protection;Access to all controls and features;Folding cover transforms the case to be a stand with two angles: perfect whenever you type an email or watch a movie.Well built to protect your Mini iPad 7.9-inch tablet for the years to come.This product is sold exclusively by BSCstore. Only buy from BSCstore to get genuine MoKo(TM) products with LIFETIME WARRANTY and superb customer service.
title: MoKo Apple iPad Mini Case - Folding Case For Mini 7.9-inch tablet, Black (with Smar Cover Auto Sleep / wake)
